subject: Algarve Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Lindsay Tarpley scored in her first start in one and a half years, Carli Lloyd added a second-half goal and the United States advanced to the Algarve Cup final.
snippet: Lindsay Tarpley scored in her first start in one and a half years, Carli Lloyd added a second-half goal and the United States advanced to the Algarve Cup final.
